sentence.Network_en: Underneath lie two differing conceptions of globalisation that make an Anglo - Indian partnership less likely.
sentence.Network_cn: 其中潜藏的对于全球化的不同见解,将降低英印合作的可能性.

sentence.Network_en: Many Anglo - Indian hybrid dishes , curries , have been created such as chicken tikka masala and balti.
sentence.Network_cn: 英国还有许多英 裔 印度人制作的菜肴和咖喱, 例如马沙拉咖喱鸡和巴蒂.

sentence.Network_en: The rest of her family had emigrated with the great Anglo - Indian exodus following Partition.
sentence.Network_cn: 其他的家人在(英巴)分治后随着英 裔 印度人大批移民的浪潮都迁居国外了.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 沪江词库精选anglo-indian是什么意思、英语单词推荐、用法及解释。anglo-indian怎么翻译: adj. 英印的  anglo-indian的英语解释:  a person of English citizenship.

entry.def: An Anglo-Indian person is someone whose family is partly British and partly Indian.

example.tran: 英印混血作家阿米塔夫·高希

entry.def: An Anglo-Indian is someone who is Anglo-Indian.

means.word_mean: 1. a person of English citizenship born or living in India
1. relating to British India or the English in India
